items.name: AI lease abstraction for SMB landlords
items.idea_summary: Agentic AI that extracts key terms from leases, populates rent rolls, flags renewals. Recurring weekly value. $1.5K-5K/yr per portfolio. Why now: AI adoption jumped 5% to 92% in CRE; deal analysis compressed from weeks to days; SMB landlords still manual.
items.why_now_thesis: LLMs crossed threshold for document understanding; lease abstraction is proven use case. Agentic AI for multi-step extraction. No well-funded player for SMB wedge.

items.name: AI tenant comms for multifamily
items.idea_summary: AI handles routine tenant inquiries, maintenance requests, lease renewals. 65% lead-to-lease reduction in residential. Recurring daily. $2K-8K/yr per property.
items.why_now_thesis: AI adoption in CRE; EliseAI $250M validates AI embedded in workflows. Agentic systems handle multi-step tenant interactions.

items.name: AI deal sourcing for small funds
items.idea_summary: AI screens hundreds of acquisitions, produces preliminary underwriting in minutes. Recurring weekly value. $3K-15K/yr. Why now: deal analysis compressed from weeks to days; small funds lack access.
items.why_now_thesis: AI in CRE execution phase. Deal analysis most mature use case. AI models screen hundreds of deals. Wedge: small funds underserved.
